title: Authors and Citation
text: Hossain (2022). pell: R package containing data historic Pell grant distribution US. https://github.com/Curious-Joe/pell, https://curious-joe.github.io/pell/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {pell: An R package containing data about historic Pell grant distribution in the US},   author = {Arafath Hossain},   year = {2022},   note = {https://github.com/Curious-Joe/pell, https://curious-joe.github.io/pell/}, }

what: An R package containing data about historic Pell grant distribution in the US
title: An R package containing data about historic Pell grant distribution in the US
text: package contains one dataset contains total Pell grant distributed different colleges/universities years across entire United States America.

title: An R package containing data about historic Pell grant distribution in the US
text: can install released version pell CRAN : can install development version pell GitHub :
code: # Install the released version from CRAN install.packages("devtools") #> Installing package into 'C:/Users/ahfah/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpcTG2Be/temp_libpath34a87fce860' #> (as 'lib' is unspecified) #> package 'devtools' successfully unpacked and MD5 sums checked #>  #> The downloaded binary packages are in #>  C:\Users\ahfah\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpoBiL5T\downloaded_packages install.packages("devtools") #> Installing package into 'C:/Users/ahfah/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpcTG2Be/temp_libpath34a87fce860' #> (as 'lib' is unspecified) #> package 'devtools' successfully unpacked and MD5 sums checked #>  #> The downloaded binary packages are in #>  C:\Users\ahfah\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpoBiL5T\downloaded_packages devtools::install_github("Curious-Joe/pell") #> Downloading GitHub repo Curious-Joe/pell@HEAD #>          checking for file 'C:\Users\ahfah\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpoBiL5T\remotes34406e684a06\Curious-Joe-pell-5c12511/DESCRIPTION' ...  ✔  checking for file 'C:\Users\ahfah\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpoBiL5T\remotes34406e684a06\Curious-Joe-pell-5c12511/DESCRIPTION' #>       ─  preparing 'pell': #>    checking DESCRIPTION meta-information ...     checking DESCRIPTION meta-information ...   ✔  checking DESCRIPTION meta-information #>       ─  checking for LF line-endings in source and make files and shell scripts #>   ─  checking for empty or unneeded directories #>       ─  building 'pell_0.0.0.9000.tar.gz' #>       #>  #> Installing package into 'C:/Users/ahfah/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpcTG2Be/temp_libpath34a87fce860' #> (as 'lib' is unspecified)

title: An R package containing data about historic Pell grant distribution in the US
text: Data collected distributed US Department Education. raw data provided website non-standardized, need extensive data cleaning make useful whole. package, raw data files sourced website, cleaned, standardized, joined together one dataset: pell: year since 1999 2017 much total money disbursed Pell grant institution across USA.

title: An R package containing data about historic Pell grant distribution in the US
code: library(pell) data(pell) head(pell) #>   STATE     AWARD RECIPIENT                               NAME SESSION YEAR #> 1    AK  197232.9       109          Alaska Pacific University 1999-00 1999 #> 2    AK  133148.0        69 Alaska Vocational Technical Center 1999-00 1999 #> 3    AK  107287.0        72            Sheldon Jackson College 1999-00 1999 #> 4    AK 3425148.8      1920   University of Alaska - Anchorage 1999-00 1999 #> 5    AK 2441864.0      1256  University of Alaska at Fairbanks 1999-00 1999 #> 6    AK  353170.0       221  University of Alaska at Southeast 1999-00 1999

title: An R package containing data about historic Pell grant distribution in the US
text: Data originally published : US Department Education Website: https://www2.ed.gov/finaid/prof/resources/data/pell-institution.html

title: Pell Grant Data — pell
text: Total dollar amount awarded Pell grant different colleges years.

title: Pell Grant Data — pell
text: data frame six variables: STATE Name state respective institution AWARD Total dollar value awarded pell grant respective institution RECIPIENT Total number pell grant recipients institution NAME Name college/university SESSION Academic session grant awarded YEAR Fiscal year grant awarded

title: Pell Grant Data — pell
text: US Department Education:  https://www2.ed.gov/finaid/prof/resources/data/pell-institution.html details federal Pell grant program, see https://www2.ed.gov/programs/fpg/index.html
